tool_description: This is the first iteration of YCombinator's Hacker News API which provides read only access to Hacker News data near real-time, including stories, comments, user data, top stories, etc.
name: Hacker News
title: Hacker News

api_list.name: Changed Items and Profiles
api_list.description: Returns the item and profile changes.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-hacker-news-v1.p.rapidapi.com/updates.json?print=pretty"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-hacker-news-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Items
api_list.description: Stories, comments, Ask HNs and polls are considered items identified by ids (unique integers)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-hacker-news-v1.p.rapidapi.com/item/8863.json?print=pretty"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-hacker-news-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://community-hacker-news-v1.p.rapidapi.com/item/{id}.json?print=pretty"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-hacker-news-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Users
api_list.description: Users are identified by case-sensitive ids
api_list.code:

        }
